channel.title: CVE Feed for Avaya -- Equinox Conferencing Management (iView)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Avaya -- Equinox Conferencing Management (iView)

item.title: CVE-2019-7007|2024-09-17T02:11:09.826Z -- avaya -- equinox%20conferencing%20management%20%28iview%29
item.description: A directory traversal vulnerability has been found in the Avaya Equinox Management(iView)versions R9.1.9.0 and earlier. Successful exploitation could potentially allow an unauthenticated attacker to access files that are outside the restricted directory on the remote server.
